overview: Veroniki, a former actress, turns 80 today. Her great granddaughter, Vera, has made many preparations for the birthday in an attempt to communicate with Veroniki, who suffers from senile dementia. Among other things, Vera has prepared a game of memories. The youngest granddaughter, Danae, refuses to participate in the effort to activate Veronica, as she considers it useless. Will Vera be able to bring her grandmother back and remind her who she is? The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: The Seagull
